Articles.Content:
You need to download the lastest version of PowerTech.dll.

I just tested it and it looks like it isn\'t compatible, but I can rebuild it later.

All three of those are separate downloads in the main post.

Thanks. Could you send me a link when you get a chance?

Also, why doesn\'t the author use Mediafire instead of dropbox? I hate how it never works when you want it too.

If anyone has links to ALL of the packs please post \'em.
You\'ll have to ask CBBP or Normak for the downloads, but I did manage to update the .craft to make it compatible again

Thanks!

I have all the mods needed on my other, better PC.

Useful to have back-ups.

If it\'s fine with the authors I could post them on Mediafire.

~I\'ve just realized that I\'m unsure why I post in lines as above. I only do it here lol.~
I just made a pretty massive fuel depot and orbited it, but the lag was horrendous. is there any way to cut down on the lag without using less parts?
I can\'t download this because dropbox says there is too much traffic. Host on mediafire OP!

can somebody please tell me what\'s new in 4.1???

4.0 works fine for me, and I\'m using 0.16

does the update just allow resizing??

The downloads are not working, the only one that works is the 32-bit one, can you please move the file to another website and provide the link please?

Thanks in advance,

-Jeremy
I already provided the mirror DL once

Hey, what are the engines on the bottom of Icarus? The first stage that separates. I need to edit their max heat because mine overheat way to fast for some reason. They overheat within ten seconds of use, then BOOM!!!!

I can\'t download this because dropbox says there is too much traffic. Host on mediafire OP!

I already provided the mirror DL once

Can someone provide a mirror for Lk and Angara? Or can the host come back?!

does anyone else have problems trying to atttach solar panels and radiators to the outside of the spacecraft? as when i try to select one or the other, im not able to select it

AND I WANNA MY SPACESTATION >

When I try to use this mod it corrupts my MechJeb mod somehow. When its loading all the parts on startup it\'ll just hang at Mechjebpod forever. Then, when I force close the game and disable Kosmos it\'ll load up just fine except that everything from MechJeb is gone. 'Reinstalling' MechJeb fixes this, but its a pain because I really want to use the Kosmos stuff.

Does anyone else have this problem?
The MuMechLib from this pack is outdated, always choose the newer file if you are asked to overwrite a plugin dll.
Theres that account punishment you were talking about Will you put the download somewhere else?

I\'m back, guys. I\'ll take care of some things real quick. I\'ll need to talk to cardboard to see what he\'s been up to.

Edit- this is going to take a bit, actually, but I have all the files and images uploading to new hosts so I can get this thing running again. Mechjeb will still be outdated for a little bit longer until I can coordinate another release.

Edit 2- should be operational now.
Mechjeb has another version of it but, can we get a redone version of the VA craft that works with .16?

How many crew do you plan to give the capsule? Do you plan on making some of the 'science' parts crewable?

EDIT: Quick question- do the UUI docking nodes actually allow spacecraft docking if there is the proper connector?
Yay Normak is back! I can stop $&@;'ing about the download!! Also, crewable science pods would be awesome. Too bad it\'d throw off my lander designs. Thanks Normak
so i don\'t know if it was brought up but is any one else having trouble using the docking units. when i try to they wont attach to anything wile im making the ship
There seems to be a problem whith the solar panels, anyone else have the same problem?
Omis you need to get the part out of the part menu and press 'W' while in the VAB/SPH to allow the nodes to connect.

Wow I am loving this mod!

I am having some issues though.

For the life of me I cannot figure out how to build I rocket strong enough to get one of my Mun Stations to orbit. I did get 1 in orbit, but I guess the top of my rocket sucked so bad that I couldn\'t get it turned to make the burn to the Mun.

Does anyone have any generic heavy lifter rocket designs that could assist in my troubles?

Thanks alot!

There seems to be a problem whith the solar panels, anyone else have the same problem?

do you mean as in you can select everything else but the solar arrays? same with mine since i updated to .16... let me know if you find a fix
thanks that one thing down now i just need to find out how and if you can recharge the ion battery from the deep space mod
